channel.title: News on Kosuke Takahashi, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in News on Kosuke Takahashi, Ph.D.

item.title: 1. PRESENTATION
item.description: I will have a poster presentation entitled “タイル画像を用いた高速かつ高精度な魚群食欲推定手法” in MIRU2025.

item.title: 2. INVITED TALK
item.description: I will have a keynote talk regarding computer vision x aquaculture in Symposium on Bio-Navi 2024 on 11th Match 2024.

item.title: 3. PAPER
item.description: Our paper entitled Structure of Multiple Mirror System From Kaleidoscopic Projections of Single 3D Point was accepted to IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI) . The paper is available from IEEE Xplore or aXiv.
